text:
*Can't use _hs_language_ Field anymore!*
The property is not available in _lists_, _workfows_ and _settings_. But it is still available in _forms_. Is this because of Salesforce integration? Even there the field is not listed.
But I have a field _*language__c*_ from Saleforce. Can I get the HubSpot field back? Or do i have to use the Saleforce language as HubSpot language in custom way to get the multi-language support back?
